import React from 'react' const MODAL_STYLES = { position: 'fixed', top: '50%', left: '50%', backgroundColor: 'rgb(34,34,34)', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', zIndex: 1000, height: '90%', width: '90%' } const OVERLAY_STYLES = { position: 'fixed', top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0, backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, .7)', zIndex: 1000 } export default function Modal({ isOpen, onClose, children }) { // Destructure props return (
<> {isOpen ? (<>
{children}
) : null}
) }
